page.title: 06CARNBROE ESTATE
page.content: {Carnbroe Estate Carnbroe Estate was built towards the end of the 1960s. The first stage was a private development then about two years later the District Council built houses on the rest of the estate.There are no amenities on the estate but there are two shops , 2 primary schools and a playpark nearby. The estate is across the North Road from Bellshill Maternity Hospital. North Road is the main "Escape Route" from Bellshill. To the North it goes to Coatbridge and joins the A8/M8 Glasgow to Edinburgh Motorway. To the South it leads to Hamilton and the M74 Motorway to the south. I do not go out much on the estate usually only on my bicycle, but even with this there is nowhere to go.
